channel.description: Recent content in Attituning on Paris Personal Blog

item.title: A Savory Way to Approach Your New Year's Resolutions This Year
item.description: The Fresh Start Effect is in full steam. More than a dozen people have asked me what my resolutions for 2019 are.

item.title: Get Up - Eat - Run
item.description: “Then he lay down and slept under the broom tree. But as he was sleeping, an angel touched him and told him, “Get up and eat.

item.title: The Biggest Problem With Food Tracking Apps
item.description: I've been logging in to MyFitnessPal for more than 80 days in a row. It has been a useful tool for tracking the food that I eat each day.

item.title: Voices in My Head
item.description: We all have voices in our head. Yes, even if you think you don’t - you still do. This is not the sixth sense type of voice coming from a ghost.

item.title: The one thing that keeps you from publishing your content.
item.description: I know that you have good intentions for your website. There is a special message that you want to share with the world.

item.title: Gratitude is a practice
item.description: A person who wants to lose weight will eat right and exercise. A person who wants to change careers will learn a new skill and find ways to practice it.

item.title: Three steps to start your Enthusiasm Engine
item.description: “Enthusiasm is one of the most powerful engines of success. When you do a thing, do it with all your might. Put your whole soul into it.

item.title: Scoreboard for Success: How do you keep score at work?
item.description: "You have to measure what you want more of.

item.title: Fail Faster and Better
item.description: When was the last time you failed at something. Or have you settled into the safe and steady zone.

item.title: Do you know when to STOP?
item.description: I was listening to a sermon by Pastor Keith Battle over at Zion Church.

item.title: Is Love a verb, noun or adjective?
item.description: Is Love a Verb, a Noun or an Adjective. Since Valentine’s day just past I thought it was worth reflecting on what love is. Here are my sources of wisdom.

item.title: Clearing the rubble
item.description: A house is built on a foundation This foundation is developed into floors. It becomes a place for living and creating memories.

item.title: What if I don't have one purpose or calling in life?
item.description: Society has pushed the belief that every person has a purpose. Many success gurus have advocated the need to find your one true passion, or calling.

item.title: One Song Technique Challenge – Will you join me?
item.description: I've got a morning commute playlist, a work playlist, and a sleep playlist. Without realizing it I have integrated music into my day.

item.title: Five free tools to deal with stress today
item.description: Stress is a part of who we are. Without stress we would not be able to stretch ourselves or achieve anything that matters.
